      • createAnimation

        public void createAnimation(TimeInstant highTime,
                            double valMin,
                            double valMax,
                            int histogramCells,
                            Position pos,
                            Form form,
                            boolean showInAnimation)
        create animation with full parameterization
        Parameters:
        highTime - initial time line from now until highTime
        valMin - initial value line from valMin to valMax
        valMax - initial value line from valMin to valMax
        histogramCells - no of histogram cells between valMin and valMax 0 means, there is no histogram support.
        pos - middle point of animation object
        form - form of animation object
        showInAnimation - switch animation on or off

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Description copied from class: Accumulate
        Resets this Accumulate object by resetting all variables to 0.0. If the flag retainLastValueOnReset is set to true, the last value is not nullified but remains unchanged.
        Overrides:
        reset in class Accumulate
